name: Grog is Angry
description:
Description

Destroy those in your path to vengeance even those who claim to be innocent. You are deranged, insane, and extremely angry. 

In the quest to quench your thirst for violence, advance into different areas and test your strength, skill and abilities. Use your tongue to destroy waves of enemies and devour the flesh and bones of the defeated.

Features:

- Top-Down Beat 'em up action

- Attack waves of enemies with your tongue

- Consume everyone in your path

- Destroy your creators

Development Team: Programmers:

Aiden Rahim
Finn McDevitt
Cooper Watson
Jordan Sims

Art and Animation:

Cooper Watson
Lynda Looc
Victoria Barber

Music:

Bailey "Snooky" Carde
